external_references.description: Microsoft. (2023, October 25). Octo Tempest crosses boundaries to facilitate extortion, encryption, and destruction. Retrieved March 18, 2024.

description: [Scattered Spider](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1015) has created volume shadow copies of virtual domain controller disks to extract the `NTDS.dit` file.(Citation: MSTIC Octo Tempest Operations October 2023)
